item.title: 特朗普将法律纠纷与迫害俄罗斯持不同政见者阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的行为相提并论。
item.description: Trump doubles down on comparing legal troubles to persecution of Russian dissident Alexei Navalny. trib.al/Yiux6qN

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼长期从事政治活动和反腐败宣传，从领导抗议活动到发表揭露政府欺诈行为的文章。
item.description: Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny had a long history of political activism and anti-corruption advocacy from leading protests to publishing exposés of government fraud. trib.al/5ZV76eG

item.title: 新提交的法庭文件显示，被指控捏造拜登总统及其儿子亨特各受贿 500 万美元的线人据称与俄罗斯情报部门有高层接触。
item.description: The informant accused of fabricating a story about Pres. Biden and his son, Hunter, taking $5 million each in bribes allegedly had high-level Russian intelligence contacts, newly filed court documents show. trib.al/0zNUaym

item.title:
美国航空公司正在推动旅客直接通过航空公司购买机票以获得忠诚积分，并提高了托运行李的费用。
以下是新政策变化的相关信息：
item.description:
American Airlines is pushing travelers to purchase flights directly through the airline to earn loyalty points and has raised the cost of checked baggage.

Here's what to know about the new policy changes: trib.al/iBm5fhq

item.title: 今年 4 月，北美将迎来 20 年来的最后一次日全食--现在，达美航空公司宣布推出一个航班，专门供乘客沿日全食路径近距离观赏日食。
item.description: North America will experience its last total solar eclipse for 20 years in April — and now Delta Airlines has announced a flight specifically intended for passengers to have an up-close view of the solar eclipse along the path of totality. trib.al/YL1rQx8

item.title: 海莉誓言继续战斗，而特朗普的团队则表示，他离获得共和党提名还有几周时间。
item.description: As Haley vows to fight on, Trump's team says he's weeks away from clinching Republican nomination. trib.al/PtNrHDs

item.title:
Capital One 收购 Discovery 的决定可能会建立一个新的巨型公司，从而撼动信用卡行业。
这对消费者意味着什么？
item.description:
Capital One's decision to acquire Discovery could establish a new megafirm that shakes up the credit card industry.

Here's what that could mean for consumers: trib.al/POtkoSN

item.title: RT by @ABC：纽约总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）告诉 ABC 新闻，如果前总统无法找到现金来支付他在民事欺诈案中被指控的近 3.55 亿美元，她准备没收他的资产。@AaronKatersky 报道。
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James told ABC News she is prepared to seize the former president's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the nearly $355 million he was charged in his civil fraud case. @AaronKatersky reports. trib.al/8oUdCFo

item.title: 前迪斯尼频道《好运查理》（Good Luck Charlie）女星布里吉特-门德勒（Bridgit Mendler）宣布，她的新项目 Northwood Space 将涉足太空产业。
item.description: Bridgit Mendler, the former Disney Channel star of "Good Luck Charlie," announced she is venturing into the space industry with her new project Northwood Space. trib.al/Kz5UtTn

item.title: 在法官下令前总统特朗普为其民事欺诈案支付 3.54 亿美元的四天后，纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯告诉 @ABC 新闻，如果特朗普无法找到现金来支付罚款，她准备没收他的资产。
item.description: Four days after a judge ordered former Pres. Trump to pay $354 million in his civil fraud case, New York Attorney General Letitia James told @ABC News that she is prepared to seize Trump's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the fine. trib.al/AUqq8yg

item.title: 德克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）表示，德克萨斯州正在德克萨斯州鹰山口（Eagle Pass）为部署在南部边境的国民警卫队成员建造一个新的军事基地。
item.description: Texas is building a new military base for National Guard members deployed to the southern border in Eagle Pass, Texas — where state and federal authorities have been in a tense conflict over dealing with immigration — Gov. Greg Abbott said. trib.al/fOhxeqG

item.title: 在南卡罗来纳州的一次演讲中，尼基-黑利发誓将继续参加2024年共和党初选，在谈到她的丈夫时，她的情绪变得激动起来，她的丈夫正随南卡罗来纳州陆军国民警卫队部署到非洲。
item.description: During a South Carolina speech where Nikki Haley vowed to stay in the 2024 Republican primary race, she grew emotional speaking about her husband, who is deployed to Africa with the South Carolina Army National Guard. trib.al/jLye0JP

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskyy）说，西方盟国推迟向乌克兰运送武器，为俄罗斯战场的推进打开了大门，使得前线部分地区的战斗 "非常困难"。
item.description: Delays in weapons deliveries from Western allies to Ukraine are opening a door for Russian battlefield advances, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says, making the fight “very difficult” along parts of the front line. trib.al/YHVnBtA

item.title: 伦敦警方表示，他们 "坚信 "已从泰晤士河中打捞出一具男子尸体，该男子涉嫌对其前伴侣及其两个年幼的女儿实施化学攻击。该女子因伤势过重住院，生命垂危。
item.description: London police said they “strongly believe” that they have pulled the body of a man from the River Thames suspected of chemically attacking his former partner and her two young daughters. The woman was left hospitalized with life-changing injuries. trib.al/JU8fVJN

item.title:
美国联合航空公司称，一架从旧金山飞往波士顿的航班因机翼受损而不得不改道。
飞机安全着陆，乘客被送上了另一架飞机。
item.description:
United Airlines says a flight heading from San Francisco to Boston had to be diverted after the plane suffered damage to one of its wings.

The plane landed safely, and passengers were put on a different plane. trib.al/cm7AlAm

item.title: 据警方称，涉嫌本月早些时候在 SoHo 一家酒店内殴打并勒死一名皇后区妇女的男子已在亚利桑那州被捕，他在那里被控犯有两起刺伤案。
item.description:
The man suspected in the beating and strangulation death of a Queens woman inside a SoHo hotel earlier this month is under arrest in Arizona, where he is charged in two stabbings, according to police.

abcnews.go.com/US/suspect-ma…

item.title: 最新消息：德克萨斯州当局宣布，他们已经找到了奥德丽-坎宁安（Audrii Cunningham）的尸体，这名 11 岁的女孩上周因错过了上学的校车而失踪。
item.description: BREAKING: Authorities in Texas announce they have found the body of Audrii Cunningham, 11-year-old girl who went missing last week when she missed her bus to school. trib.al/NDDDxge

item.title:
由于大气层中的河流持续降雨，3700 万加利福尼亚人正处于洪水警戒状态。
查看最新预报：
item.description:
Thirty-seven million Californians are on alert for flooding as an atmospheric river continues to inundate the state with rain.

See the latest forecast: trib.al/T5nLIkw

item.title: 最新消息：调查人员说，他们已经找到了一名 11 岁德克萨斯州女孩的尸体。
item.description:
BREAKING: Investigators said that they have found the body of an 11-year-old Texas girl who went missing last week when she missed her bus to school.

abcnews.go.com/US/missing-11…

item.title: 最新消息：调查人员说，他们已经找到了一名 11 岁德克萨斯州女孩的尸体。
item.description: BREAKING: Investigators said that they have found the body of an 11-year-old Texas girl who went missing last week when she missed her bus to school. trib.al/30ofHKG

item.title: 在法官下令前总统特朗普为其民事欺诈案支付 3.54 亿美元的四天后，纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯（Letitia James）告诉 ABC 新闻，如果前总统无法找到现金来支付罚款，她准备没收他的资产。
item.description:
Four days after a judge ordered former Pres. Trump to pay $354 million in his civil fraud case, NY AG Letitia James told ABC News that she is prepared to seize the former president's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the fine.

abcnews.go.com/US/letitia-ja…

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州立法机构正在审议一项法案，该法案将取消对图书管理员在图书中包含所谓 "淫秽 "内容方面的保护。
item.description: The West Virginia legislature is considering a bill that would remove protections for librarians concerning books that include alleged "obscene" material. trib.al/gWys9fv

item.title: 美国官员说，美国外交官正准备向联合国安理会提交一份决议，呼吁在加沙实行临时停火，以换取释放飞地内的所有人质，并提出其他几项要求。
item.description: American diplomats are preparing to present a resolution to the U.N. Security Council calling for a temporary cease-fire in Gaza in exchange for the release of all hostages held inside the enclave and making several other demands, U.S. officials said. trib.al/Yw7nOQL

item.title: 在全国各地的手术室里，越来越多的糖尿病患者因 2 型糖尿病并发症而接受截肢手术。
item.description: In operating rooms across the country, more and more diabetics are receiving amputations due to complications from type-2 diabetes. trib.al/lHqaObZ

item.title: 据弗吉尼亚理工大学称，该校一名 20 岁的学生几天前失踪。
item.description: A 20-year-old Virginia Tech student has been reported missing after he vanished days ago, according to the university. trib.al/jFhgPhH

item.title: YouTube 视频博客作者鲁比-弗兰科（Ruby Franke）于 12 月在犹他州承认了四项虐待儿童的罪名，并被连续判处一至十五年的监禁。
item.description: YouTube vlogger Ruby Franke has been sentenced to four consecutive sentences of one to 15 years in prison after pleading guilty to four counts of child abuse in Utah in December. abcnews.visitlink.me/Id90ST

item.title: 据警方称，涉嫌本月早些时候在 SoHo 一家酒店内殴打并勒死一名皇后区妇女的男子已在亚利桑那州被捕，他在那里被控犯有两起刺伤案。
item.description: The man suspected in the beating and strangulation death of a Queens woman inside a SoHo hotel earlier this month is under arrest in Arizona, where he is charged in two stabbings, according to police. trib.al/0Ec9kAD

item.title: Connexions Classroom 创始人、Ruby Franke 的前商业伙伴 Jodi Hildebrandt 在承认四项虐待儿童罪后，被连续判处四次一至十五年的监禁。
item.description: Connexions Classroom founder and Ruby Franke's former business partner Jodi Hildebrandt has been sentenced to four consecutive terms of one to 15 years after pleading guilty to four counts of child abuse. trib.al/Ym8fVO6

item.title: 最新消息：检察官宣布，两名成年人因涉嫌参与上周在酋长队超级碗游行中发生的大规模枪击案而受到指控。
item.description: BREAKING: Two adults have been charged in connection with the mass shooting at the Chiefs' Super Bowl parade last week, prosecutors announced. trib.al/MFkbQ5X

item.title: 最新消息：检察官宣布，两名成年人因涉嫌参与上周在酋长队超级碗游行中发生的大规模枪击案而受到指控。
item.description: BREAKING: Two adults have been charged in connection with the mass shooting at the Chiefs' Super Bowl parade last week, prosecutors announced. trib.al/YZuXahs
